config_part.ioc_details: Coordinates values from different IOCs using a state machine.

macro.name: IFRIKEN
macro.description: Space if on RIKEN beamline, # otherwise. (Default='#')

macro.name: RIKEN_PC_IN
macro.description: RIKEN port change input PV. Prefix added automatically.

macro.name: RIKEN_PC_OUT
macro.description: RIKEN port change output PV. Prefix added automatically.

macro.name: RIKEN_RB2C_IN
macro.description: RIKEN RB2 mode change input PV. Prefix added automatically.

macro.name: RIKEN_RB2C_OUT
macro.description: RIKEN RB2 mode change output PV. Prefix added automatically.
